extendedInfo.description: This exam indicates a foundation or apprentice knowledge of network design for the Cisco converged networks based on Borderless Network Architecture. CCDA certified professionals can design routed and switched network infrastructures and services involving LAN, WAN, wireless, and broadband access for businesses and organizations.App features: There are three main functions focusing on program Training In this section, candidate can choose the number of questions in order or random, set the countdown timer for each practicing item.  Exam  	Candidate will have the opportunity to test with the number of questions in the same time as the exam. After completing, the result will be notified immediately   History  	Candidate can review the result of previous examThere are two types of questions that app can support:â¢	Single choiceâ¢	Multiple choiceSpeed up your career and make your exam easier with this training app as your guide 1.1	Exam TopicsThe following information provides general guidelines for the content likely to be included on the Designing Cisco Internetworking exam. However, other related topics may also appear on any specific delivery of the exam.1.2	Describe the Methodology used to design a networkâ¢	Describe developing business trendsâ¢	Identify Network Requirements to Support the Organizationâ¢	Describe the tools/process to characterize an existing networkâ¢	Describe the top down approach to network designâ¢	Describe Network Management Protocols and Features1.3	Describe network structure and modularityâ¢	Describe the Network Hierarchyâ¢	Describe the Modular Approach in Network Designâ¢	Describe network architecture for the enterprise1.4	Design Basic Enterprise Campus Networksâ¢	Describe Campus Design considerationsâ¢	Design the Enterprise Campus Networkâ¢	Design the enterprise data centerâ¢	Describe enterprise network virtualization tools1.5	Design Enterprise Edge and Remote Network Modulesâ¢	Describe the Enterprise Edge, branch, and Teleworker design characteristicsâ¢	Describe physical and logical WAN connectivityâ¢	Design the branch office WAN solutionsâ¢	Describe Access Network solutions for a remote workerâ¢	Design the WAN to support selected redundancy methodologiesâ¢	Identify Design Considerations for a Remote Data Center1.6	Design IP Addressing and Routing Protocolsâ¢	Describe IPv4 Addressingâ¢	Describe IPv6 Addressingâ¢	Identify Routing Protocol Considerations in an Enterprise Networkâ¢	Design a Routing Protocol Deployment1.7	Design network servicesâ¢	Describe the security lifecycleâ¢	Identify Cisco technologies to mitigate security vulnerabilitiesâ¢	Select appropriate Cisco security solutions and deployment placementâ¢	Describe high level voice and video architecturesâ¢	Identify the design considerations for voice/video servicesâ¢	Describe Cisco Unified Wireless Network Architectures and Featuresâ¢	Design wireless network using controllersThe following course is the recommended training for this exam.â¢	Designing for Cisco Internetwork Solutions (DESGN)
